ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance, 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination, Metal vandal proof & water proof;; 4* CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance, Low Illumination 0.1 Lux, Metal vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 960×480 & 30FPS Recording, HI 3521 CPU. Supports HDMI & VGA
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
